name: Gods of Sparta (itch)
description:
Pick 10 mythical monsters and heroes from the card deck to beat your opponent. Enhance your units with powerful artifacts that increase attack, defense and speed.

Play against family and friends on a single device!

• different factions of units with various special abilities
• melee, ranged, flying and magical attacks
• each unit has strong and weak points for a balanced game play
• single player campaign against computer also available
• original music

Shoot thunderbolts with Zeus, petrify opponents with Medusa, devour the enemies with Minotaur or use invulnerable Achilles and three-headed Cerberus to defeat your foe. Use Catapult to pick on opposing troops from the distance or a Dragon with devastating attack from above. Assign Hercules or Theseus to slay the Phoenix, which would rise from the ashes. Use Athena's Aegis to protect your troops and Hades to reap the souls of the dead and increase your power. This game is not a CCG. There is no collecting of cards, only the battle and strategy.
